data.title: World's lawmakers endorse making political corruption a Crime Against Humanity, at United Nations UNCAC
NSA's Blackmail By Porn Strategy, The Abuse We Were All Waiting For

Dutch intelligence agency caught abusing powers to steal full databases from internet forums, "marry that data with other social network info," then share it with the NSA. MPs denounce the operation and call for full inquiry.

Leaked paper reveals UN split over war on drugs - Instead, a number of countries are pushing for the "war on drugs" to be seen in a different light, which places greater emphasis on treating drug consumption as a public health problem, rather than a criminal justice matter.
Thousands expected to take part in "Day of Rage" protests against Israel's plan to displace tens of thousands of Bedouin.
Mangalyaan, India's Mars Orbiter, has successfully commenced its journey to Mars
Berlin council votes to open first cannabis cafe
Pope launches blistering attack on the 'tyranny of capitalism' as he warns we're all heading towards 'disintegration and death'
Life imprisonment of five out of six teachers for repeatedly raping a 19-year-old Untouchable girl student
